Just one problem: There were only 12 days to prepare -- and most of those days I was busy with other stuff, so just had 12 *nights* to prepare.

fullText: Wealth in well functioning societies is always tied to productive capacity. You cannot redistribute productive capacity. You can only bring the total productive capacity of a society down by penalizing hard-working and competent people. But infrastructure and positivity work.
